alert.note: Alert for Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 12:44PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Scott and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1243 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Muddy Creek WMA, or 17 miles northwest of Mount Ida. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harvey... Cedar Creek... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
